name: Project ZYX
description:
This is a small prototype version game developed over the course of four months or so as the final project in my design college course. It is fairly incomplete as a game, as it was developed entirely by me over a very short period of time.

Leaving it here for portfolio reasons.

The game itself is a very short 2D top down combat-less exploration experience focusing on movement, collecting, and environmentally told narratives.

The game can be played with a controller or the keyboard. 

Arrow keys / Analog stick - Moving 

Z key / A button - Confirm / Jump

D key / X button - Drill

Enter / Start - Pause menu

0 key - full screen

Press Esc twice to quit at any moment

additional controls are presented as skills unlock
